Description: Reverend Guitar - Tommy Koffin Signature This Reverend Tommy Koffin signature is in excellent condition. Serial number - 29175, weight - 7.45 lbs Koffin Kat's Tommy Koffin and got together and collaboratively designed his signature model. With some true-to-Reverend features such as a korina solid body, pin-lock tuners, and a bass contour control, this guitar can appeal to Reverend fans everywhere. But, the sparkle finish, which isn't seen on any other Reverend models, makes it stand out from the rest. The guitar is loaded with Hyper Vintage humbuckers in the bridge and neck, and is equipped with a Wilkinson WVS50 IIK tremolo system. Features & Technical Specs: Body Wood: Korina solidbody Body Color/Finish: Silver Sparkle Neck Wood: Roasted maple - satin amber finish Neck Profile: Medium oval Neck Radius: 12" Neck Joint: Bolt-on Fingerboard: Blackwood Fingerboard Inlays: Dots Frets: 22 medium jumbo Nut: Boneite Nut Width: 43mm Tuners: Reverend pin-lock Scale Length: 25-1/2" Bridge: Wilkinson WVS50 IIK tremolo Pickups: Railhammer Chisel Controls: Volume, Tone, Bass Contour, 3-way Jack Location: Side Hardware Finish: Chrome Case: Not included Country Of Origin: South Korea Serial Number: 29175 Weight: 7.45lbs Switching: 3-Way pickup selector: P1 - Bridge pickup P2 - Bridge & neck pickup P3 - Neck pickup
Title: Reverend Tommy Koffin Roasted Maple Neck - Silver Sparkle - Premium Preowned
